header.title: Engaging the voices of Sámi children | Sámi allaskuvla

body.dependency:
"<Sámi>" "sápmi" N Sem/Hum_Lang Sg Gen <W:0.0> @>N #1->2 : "<máná>" "mánná" N Sem/Hum Sg Gen <W:0.0> @>N #2->3 : "<áigumušat>" "áigumuš" N Sem/Prod-cogn Pl Nom <W:0.0> @HNOUN #3->0 : "<->" "-" PUNCT <W:0.0> #4->5 : "<Sámi>" "Sápmi" N Prop Sem/Plc Sg Gen <W:0.0> @X #5->0 : "<children>" "children" ? @X #6->0 : "<voices>" "voices" ? @X #7->0 : "<¶>" "¶" CLB <W:0.0> #8->3 :\n
